tool_description: Collects comprehensive baseline environmental data for a mining site including meteorological, geological, hydrological, and ecological parameters.
error_messages: Invalid coordinates: Latitude must be between -90 and 90, longitude between -180 and 180.
Invalid site area: Site area must be greater than 0 hectares.
Data unavailable: No environmental data available for the specified coordinates.
usage: Provide the site's latitude, longitude, and total area in hectares to collect baseline environmental data for impact assessment.

elevation.description: Site elevation in meters above sea level

soil_types.description: List of soil types present at the site

vegetation_types.description: List of vegetation types present at the site
